otherNightReminder: Replace the Plague Doctor's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the "Is the Plague Doctor" reminder token (that player is still the good Plague Doctor). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.
If the Plague Doctor is executed and the Storyteller would gain the Boomdandy ability, the Boomdandy ability triggers immediately.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Goblin ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.
Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Cannibal.
If a Riot player nominates and kills the Sage, the Sage uses their ability tonight.
Riot registers as a Minion to the Town Crier.
Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
